hadiths.text: Narrated 'Imran bin Husain:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) asked a man: Did you fast the last day of Sha'ban ? He replied: No. He said: If you did not observe a fast, you must fast for a day. One of the two narrators said: For two days

chapter.eng-name: Regarding Preceding (Ramadan By Fasting At The End Of Sha'ban)
